segments.text: Ladies and gentlemen , here is the Westminster Abbey . It's one of the oldest buildings in London .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a large building . Can we visit by ourselves ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Take your time and enjoy your trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . When and where shall we meet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will meet at 5:00 right here .
segments.speaker: S1
